00038 #pragma pack(push)

00040   struct WPDTstruct

00051 #pragma pack(pop)
00052 
00053   WPDTstruct data;

00055   std::string name, model, icon, enchant, script;
00056 
00057   void load(ESMReader &esm)
00058   {
00059     model = esm.getHNString("MODL");
00060     name = esm.getHNOString("FNAM");
00061     esm.getHNT(data, "WPDT", 32);
00062     script = esm.getHNOString("SCRI");
00063     icon = esm.getHNOString("ITEX");
